text: Redshank may refer to: *Redshank (soldier), 16th-century Scottish mercenaries == Birds == *Common redshank Tringa totanus, a shorebird *Spotted redshank Tringa erythropus, a shorebird == Plants == *Redshanks Adenostoma sparsifolium, a shrub *Redshank Persicaria maculosa, a plant in the buckwheat family *Redshank Ceratodon purpureus, a moss *Scarce redshank Ceratodon conicus, a moss of Britain and Ireland
title: Redshank
